title: Kumari
short_cast: Aishwarya Lekshmi, Shine Tom Chacko, Swasika, Surabhi Lekshmi, Spadikam George, Shivajith, Giju John, Tanvi Ram

desc: After marrying into a wealthy family, Kumari moves into her husband's ancestral home where darkness lurks amid superstition, faith and folklore.
